sqlQuery.name: SequencesByOrganismAbbrev
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sa.source_id from apidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes sa, apidb.Organism o where sa.taxon_id = o.taxon_id and o.abbrev = $$organismAbbrev$$

sqlQuery.name: organismAbbrevs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct o.abbrev as internal, o.abbrev as term from apidb.organism o

sqlQuery.name: SequenceAlias
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sequence as source_id, id as old_source_id from apidbTuning.GenomicSequenceId

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, organism as organism_full, genbank_accession, organism, case when (sequence_description) is not null then sequence_description when (chromosome is not null) then organism || ' - Chromosome ' || chromosome_order_num else organism end as description from apidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes

sqlQuery.name: Aliases
sqlQuery.sql: select si.sequence as source_id, si.id as seq_id from apidbTuning.GenomicSequenceId si
